description: Health Canada, Digital Change Management for the Regulatory Operations and Enforcement Branch (ROEB) has a requirement for up to six (6) TSPS Level 3 Change Management Consultant on an as and when required basis.",
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title:** Task and Solutions Professional Services – Change Management Consultant (Level 3) SRV

**Reference Number:** CB-7540-42724065

**Publication Date:** 25 July 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** 15 August 2023 14:00:00 EST

The Government of Canada issues this request for proposal tender for the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) for up to six (6) Change Management Consultants (Level 3) on an as-and-when-required basis, as per procurement category SRV.

Health Canada’s Regulatory Operations and Enforcement Branch (ROEB) requires these services to support digital transformation and strategic change management initiatives. The contract duration is for initial period plus two 1-year option periods.

**Scope of Work:**
Change management consulting services are required to support the implementation and strategic change management initiatives across the Regulatory Operations and Enforcement Branch.

**Key Objectives:** 

* Provide expert guidance to manage change and adoption across the organizational units within the Regulatory Operations and Enforcement Branch
* Support organizational strategic plan development and review
* Conduct change management assessments and develop recommendations to ensure effective change adoption

**Tender Evaluation Criteria:**

* Maximum Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Trade Agreements:**
The Government of Canada recognizes the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-China Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**

* Ottawa, ON

**Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective Tendering

**Timeline:**

* Initial Contract Duration: two (2) years
* One (1) additional one-year option period
* Second (2) additional one-year option period

The solicitation reference number is [insert reference number]. For any inquiries, please contact Ahmad Omary at ahmad.omary@hc-sc.gc.ca, (000) 000
